title: Pixel 4 XL - Android 10 - Sensors not working after May 2020 update
content:
After the May 2020 update some of the sensors on my phone are not functioning. 
- Gyroscope
- Acceleration (with g)
- Acceleration (without g)
- Magnetometer 

In camera and other apps screen rotate doesn't work. I have enabled auto-rotate.
I google maps the direction/compass doesn't work. The compass symbol appears and then disappears. 

I have tried the following:
- Booted into Safe mode but no change.
- Factory reset but no change.

There are many posts online with similar issues. I haven't seen any resolution.

Is there any way to fix this or do I need to get the phone replaced? 

Please assist.
Shehan
